intro: Bleekeria minima, commonly known as the small bleekeria, is a small, flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, which is also known as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its compact growth habit and produces small, star-shaped flowers that are typically yellow or orange in color. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often growing on rocky soils. Due to its unique appearance and limited distribution, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
